name: lume
exports COMMENT:: This removes 'dist' from import statements, as well as replaces the 'main' field. See https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/14970#issuecomment-571887546
// NOTE: Any field starting with `//` is intended as a comment.

scripts.lint-format: npm run lint-all && npm run prettier:check && npm run build && echo 'implement tests'
scripts.lint-all: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-ts
scripts.lint-fix-all: npm run lint-js -- --fix && npm run lint-ts -- --fix
scripts.lint-watch: npm run lint-js -- --watch & p5=$!; npm run lint-ts -- --watch & p6=$!; wait $p5 $p6
scripts.// ^ TODO: Move eslint stuff into lume cli.
scripts.install: npm run update:modules && npm run reset && npm run docs:build
scripts.build:all: npm run clean:all && lerna run build
scripts.dev:all: echo TODO run everything in dev mode with rebuild on changed files
scripts.clean:packages: (lerna run clean && npm run unbootstrap -- --ignore lume) || true
scripts.// ^ test:all:ci: Concurrency needs to be 1 in CI for some reason, but I forgot to comment why.
scripts.reset: npm run clean:packages && npm run bootstrap && npm run build:all
scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap --ignore '{,readem,glas}' --no-ci --ignore-scripts && lerna bootstrap --scope '{,readem}' --no-ci --ignore-scripts && lerna bootstrap --scope '{,glas}' --no-ci && rimraf './packages/**/node_modules/electron/'
scripts.// ^ bootstrap: Bootstrap everything except readem, and then readem by itself, to avoid a circular link. (lume->readem->lume).
scripts.// ^ bootstrap 2: TODO bootstrap readem along with cli (somehow?), so that cli is linked into it. Maybe the scope would be {,readem,cli}?
scripts.// ^ bootstrap 3: We use --ignore-scripts so that the bootstrap doesn't run prepare scripts (except with the glas package which requires a postinstall step for webgl-raub). We want it to only put dependencies in place. A subsequent lerna build step builds everything in correct order. Otherwise some packages will try to build themselves before dependencies are in place.
scripts.// ^ bootstrap 4: Apparently --ignore-scripts isn't working, and prepare scripts still run unexpectedly. https://github.com/lerna/lerna/issues/3050
scripts.// ^ bootstrap 5: We remove electron from all packages so that build/test will use the electron at the root (i.e. a manually-hoisted electron), otherwise build/test fails.
scripts.// ^ unbootstrap: 'lerna clean --yes' removes all node_modules while 'lerna run clean' runs each project's particular 'clean' script.
scripts.purge: (npm run clean:packages && npm run unbootstrap) || true
scripts.website: (npm run docs:serve & p1=$!; npm run website:landing & p2=$!; wait $p1 $p2)
scripts.website:publish: git push && ssh infamous@trusktr.io "bash --login -c 'cd ~/lume+lume && npm run update:clean' && echo 'Enter root password to restart web server:' && su -c 'systemctl restart lume-website.service'"
scripts.update:clean: git reset --hard && git submodule foreach git reset --hard && npm run update
scripts.// docs TODO: build docs into a separate folder instead of moving files in.
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:link && node --input-type module < ./scripts/build-docs.js
scripts.docs:link: ln -sf ../node_modules docs/node_modules && ln -sf ../dist/global.js docs/global.js && ln -sf ../dist/global.js.map docs/global.js.map && ln -sf ../../../packages/element-behaviors/README.md docs/guide/includes/element-behaviors.md && ln -sf ../../../packages/element/README.md docs/guide/includes/lume-element.md && ln -sf ../../../packages/variable/README.md docs/guide/includes/lume-variable.md && ln -sf ../../../packages/autolayout/README.md docs/guide/includes/lume-autolayout.md
scripts.docs:clean: rm -f docs/src && rm -f docs/node_modules && rm -f docs/global.js && rm -f docs/global.js.map && rm -rf docs/api/
scripts.docs: npm run build && npm run docs:build && npm run docs:serve
